p: Hydrogens and Gasteiger charges were added and all the hetero-atoms and water molecules were removed from protein structure. The protonated protein initially optimized in order to remove all the bad steric clashes using AMBER99 force field (Cornell et al. 1996), while MMFF94s force field parameters (Halgren 1996) and (Halgren 1999) were performed for small molecules. The protonated and optimized structures were saved for further preparation and analysis. All the minimizations were performed with MOE (grade < 0.001).
